quote: Winter is coming.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: When you play a game of thrones you win or you die.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: Why is it that when one man builds a wall, the next man immediately needs to know what's on the other side?
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: You know nothing, Jon Snow
author: George R.R. Martin
source: A Song of Ice and Fire

quote: History is a wheel, for the nature of man is fundamentally unchanging. What has happened before will perforce happen again.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: A day will come when you think yourself safe and happy, and suddenly your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth, and you'll know the debt is paid.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: 'Shadows.' The world seemed darker when he said it. 'Every man who walks the earth casts a shadow on the world. Some are thin and weak, others long and dark.'
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: One ring to rule them all ...
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Do not meddle in the affairs of wizards, for they are subtle and quick to anger.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: There is some good in this world, and it's worth fighting for.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: It's a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door. You step onto the road, and if you don't keep your feet, there's no knowing where you might be swept off to.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Run when you have to, fight when you must, rest when you can.
author: Robert Jordan

quote: Time to toss the dice.
author: Robert Jordan

quote: I've seen men die because they were sure that what should not happen,would not.
author: Robert Jordan

quote: It was easier to be brave when someone needed your protection.
author: Robert Jordan

quote: A young man chases shadows and runs from moonlight, and in the end he stabs himself in the foot with his own spear.
author: Robert Jordan

quote: History. Language. Passion. Custom. All these things determine what men say, think, and do. These are the hidden puppet-strings from which all men hang
author: R Scott Bakker

quote: Darkness shields as much as it threatens.
author: R Scott Bakker

quote: Love is lust made meaningful. Hope is hunger made human.
author: R Scott Bakker

quote: If soot stains your tunic, dye it black. This is vengeance
author: R Scott Bakker

quote: Saying 'I could have done more,' Zin, is what marks a man as a man and not a God.
author: R Scott Bakker

quote: For all things there is a toll. We pay in breaths, and our purse is soon empty
author: R Scott Bakker

quote: Most men would rather die in deception than live in uncertainty.
author: R Scott Bakker

quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: J.K. Rowling
source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Alkaban

quote: Nothing like a nighttime stroll to give you ideas.
author: J.K. Rowling
source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Curiosity is not a sin… But we should exercise caution with our curiosity… yes, indeed.
author: J.K. Rowling
source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
author: J.K. Rowling
source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone

quote: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
author: J.K. Rowling
source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: Never trust anything that can think for itself if you can’t see where it keeps its brain.
author: J.K. Rowling
source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
